content.rendered:
Private boutique accommodation complex on the seaside

CURRENTLY AVAILABLE

$495,000+vat

register interest

Property Information

Kakera Apartments is a private boutique accommodation complex of 4 uniquely-designed apartments on the seaside at Matavera in Rarotonga.

Within the complex, an option now exists to acquire this two-bedroom family apartment villa on an individual unit title sublease of 327sqm subject to a head lease running until 2062.

Designed and built using a mix of materials to create a modern Pacific eco-environment, this unique apartment offers interior space of 203sqm. Consisting of two ocean-facing bedrooms, shared walk-in wardrobe, two bathrooms, large entrance and stairway, open-plan lounge/dining/kitchen area, opening onto a private 108sqm courtyard complete with plunge pool.

Both bedrooms are located on the upper level and feature parquet flooring, exposed ceiling trusses, good natural light and views of the sea. The master bedroom suite offers an impressive volume of space and features its own private ensuite bathroom, lounge area (which could be used as private office space), and open deck.

The open-plan living/dining/kitchen has an urban tropical feel blending polished concrete flooring, exposed block walls, corrugated iron ceiling, large windows and glass doors. Opening onto an enclosed garden courtyard with plunge pool, creating the perfect day and night oasis to relax and enjoy the tropical surroundings of paradise.

Being sold complete with all furnishings, making this offering an attractive rental investment on either the short-term holiday or long-term let market, or as your very own secluded hideaway retreat on the Eastern sunrise side of Rarotonga.

Get in touch with us at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for more details!

  • Option to acquire a 2-bedroom apartment villa on an individual unit title sublease of 327sqm until 2062
  • Situated on the seaside on the Eastern sunrise coast of Rarotonga
  • 2-levels of interior space 203sqm; unit grounds of 124sqm
  • Ocean-facing bedrooms and open deck
  • Air-conditioned master bedroom suite features its own private bathroom ensuite, lounge with outdoor space
  • Sold fully furnished
  • Possibility to purchase the entire 4-apartment complex set on full leasehold section of 937sqm until 2062
  • Common areas include parking, large paved patio area amidst lush gardens, and gate with access to beach
Register interest

Register your interest

Get in touch at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for further details!

  • enquire@jefftikitaurealestate.com
  • +682 53659
  • Main Road, Avarua Rarotonga, Cook Islands
